post.title: Understanding Web Development Basics
post.content: Web development encompasses a range of skills and technologies that are essential for building functional websites and applications. In this post, we'll explore the basics of HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.

seo.description: Learn the fundamentals of web development, including HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.
seo.keywords: web development, HTML, CSS, JavaScript, web programming

post.author: Likhon Sheikh
